channel.title: Earnings on granthutchison
channel.description: Recent content in Earnings on granthutchison

item.title: Shiny New Things!
item.description: It’s fast approaching a year since I last wrote about how much money my little app side hustle was bringing in, and how I had (at that point) reached a basic ‘break even’ point, which I defined as ‘my app bills for year paid’ i.e. bringing in enough to cover the price of my annual Apple developer subscription, covering my one off Google Play developer bill and covering the cost of setting up some domains I purchased as app landing pages.
